name: launch_procedure
body: let mt = MintTo { mint : ctx . accounts . mint . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . destination . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () , } ;
mint_to (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , mt) , amount) ? ;

let ca = CloseAccount { account : ctx . accounts . temp_account . to_account_info () , destination : ctx . accounts . return_account . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () , } ;
close_account (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , ca)) ? ;
let timestamp = Clock :: get () ? . unix_timestamp as u64 ;
let rec = & mut ctx . accounts . rec ;
rec . counter = rec . counter . checked_add (1) . unwrap () ;
msg ! ("Case 605: minted {}, closed temp, counter {}, at {}" , amount , rec . counter , timestamp) ;
